record.title: MEMBERSHIP OF THE JOINT COMMITTEE ON PRINTING AND THE JOINT COMMITTEE ON THE LIBRARY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 98.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed too, the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed at the appropriate place in the Record as if given, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
